description: This stew is inspired by Greek flavours and is worth the wait for tender, slow cooked lamb shoulder.
name: Lamb, Eggplant & Capsicum Stew Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 large red capsicums, cored and chopped
1.5kg lamb shoulder, boneless, trimmed and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large casserole dish on medium high heat and cook the eggplant and capsicums for 10 minutes to soften. Remove with a slotted spoon and set aside on a plate.

Add the diced lamb to the casserole dish and cook for 5-6 minutes to seal on all sides. Stir in the onion and cook for 5 minutes. Sprinkle over the oregano and lemon zest, pour in the chopped tomatoes, cover and simmer for 2 hours.
Return the eggplant and capsicums to the casserole and cook on medium for 15 minutes, until warmed through. Serve with chopped parsley on top.
